import { Container, Form, FormGroup, Button, Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Cadastrar() { const [form, setForm ] = useState({ nome: "", sobrenome: "", cpf: "", dataNasc: "", telefone: "", sexo: "", endereco: "", numero: "", complemento: "", cidade: "", estado: "", CEP:"", email: "", senha:"", checkOfertas: "", checkTermos: "", }) const controleMudanca = (evento) => { console.log(evento.target.value); console.log(form); setForm({ ...form, nome: evento.target.value }) console.log(form); } const controleEnvio = (evento) => { } return (
